entry.title: The Portal Page
entry.para: This portal page provides a quick summary of all your important information. For example, it might show how many new e-mail messages you have in your INBOX, upcoming events on your calendar, tasks on your to-do list, headlines from selected news services, and so on.
The contents of this portal page are customizable via the "Add Content" button. For example, you can choose which items to include on this portal page as well as in which order they are shown.
